thread.title: Live: Major police incident after 'suspicious package' found in Northern Quarter
thread.title_full: Live: Major police incident after 'suspicious package' found in Northern Quarter

author: Sam Yarwood
title: Live: Major police incident after 'suspicious package' found in Northern Quarter
text:
'About the size of a cigarette packet' 16:03 Bus services back to normal 
Confirmation from Transport for Greater Manchester that the roads are now back to normal... 15:56 Andrew Bardsley This is the street... 
This picture, sent to us by @choyster on Twitter, clearly shows the stretch of Lever Street that had been cordoned off between Dale Street and Piccadilly Gardens. 15:50 Police cordon taken down on Lever Street 15:49
